page.title: 02BOURNE FARM, HAREFIELD.
page.content: The farm is about 1 km. S.E. of the village centre.It is located over London Clay and is mostly pastoral in nature.The size of the farm is 100 ha. and it carries 270 cattle-split evenly for dairy and beef sales.Recent E.E.C. regulations have caused a decrease in the output of milk and this has been the cause of much discontent.A cooperative system operates among the local farmers for the sale of their beef products. Mechanisation has taken over many jobs that were once done by hand and the farm now employs only two workers other than the farmer and his family. As this is totally a livestock farm there is always some task to be done: the result is that farming in such an area becomes a way of life as well as a business.
